hero.title: Criminal Court of Appeal
hero.text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Nobis distinctio omnis voluptates enim deserunt eaque hic et quibusdam, maxime laudantium accusamus aliquid quis iusto dolore possimus rem soluta reiciendis ex.

about.text: Within every governorate, there is one or more courts of appeal.
The Court of Appeal consists of 3 judges: a president and two consultants.
The public prosecution is represented before the Court of Appeal by the Appellate Public Prosecutor or an Attorney General.
